channel.title: Text interface?
channel.description: Does anyone have a text interface id along with the id's for the lines? like an interface showing: "the cave looks too dark, I need a candle!"

item.title: Text interface?
item.dc:creator: @xx_nub_xx xx nub xx
item.description:
@xx_nub_xx wrote:

i know it would work, but it would most likely cause lag while looking through 20k ids… although you are right you could use this to find different interface ids if you didn’t have a list.

Read full topic

item.title: Text interface?
item.dc:creator: @Hiaburi Hiaburi
item.description:
@Hiaburi wrote:

Just to use for testing nub, i made mine run from like 0-20k and set ea one = to the number it was at, it was simple and showed me all the stuff i needed, and i am pretty sure zero freeze told me to do that when i asked how a couple months back…

Read full topic

item.title: Text interface?
item.dc:creator: @delta delta
item.description:
@delta wrote:

Uhh problem solved thanks to xx nub xx lol

Read full topic

item.title: Text interface?
item.dc:creator: @xx_nub_xx xx nub xx
item.description:
@xx_nub_xx wrote:

why would you set a loop to run through all the lines of text… you do know there are ids from 150 - 15000… that would most likely cause tons of lag

Read full topic

item.title: Text interface?
item.dc:creator: @Hiaburi Hiaburi
item.description:
@Hiaburi wrote:

um, try a loop, thats what they told me when i asked for lines, just make a command that will loop through all possible lines and run it, have it set the line = to the line number. Simple but it seemed like if there where morethen like 20k lines in the macro mine always crashed.

Read full topic

item.title: Text interface?
item.dc:creator: @delta delta
item.description:
@delta wrote:

Lol I already had those interface but ok i’ll add it up for a try

Read full topic

item.title: Text interface?
item.dc:creator: @xx_nub_xx xx nub xx
item.description:
@xx_nub_xx wrote:

356	Single line text [click here to continue]
359	Two line text [click here to continue]
363	Three line text [click here to continue]
368	Four line text [click here to continue]

yea im not sure about the lines of text either, but on most interfaces, the lines of text are like the interface id ± 1 so for the 356 interface, i would guess 357, 358 etc.

Read full topic

item.title: Text interface?

item.description:

Yeah I found some, but I don’t have the ids for the lines of the text so yeah lol

so you want basically an interface that has text and then “click here to continue” at the bottom? i have a list of interfaces with editable text, this might be on it. one second
